TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IStyleConnector

summary.span: 提供由 WPF XAML 剖析器 (Parser) 在內部使用的方法，在已編譯的 XAML 中附加事件和事件 Setter。

span.span: Provides methods used internally by the WPF XAML parser to attach events and event setters in compiled XAML.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別不是用於由 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目。The class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler. 它是由產生的程式碼會執行之範本或類似的 factory 模型牽涉到的標記事件連接參考。It is referenced by generated code that does event wiring for markup that involves templates or a similar factory model.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Connect (int connectionId, object target);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Connect(int32 connectionId, object target) cil managed
Public Sub Connect (connectionId As Integer, target As Object)
public: void Connect(int connectionId, System::Object ^ target);

param.name: connectionId
param.span: 供寫入事件之用的唯一的連接 ID。

span.span: The unique connection ID for event wiring purposes.

summary.span: 在已編譯的內容中，附加事件和事件 Setter 及範本。

span.span: Attaches events on event setters and templates in compiled content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別不是用於由 WPF XAML 標記編譯器以外的任何項目。The class is not intended for use by anything other than the WPF XAML markup compiler.
